article_title: Pugh makes bid for House District 82

article_metadata.author: James CoburnSpecial to The Sun

og.description: Adam Pugh saw the difference a good man can make when he was on the staff of former U.S. Sen. Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania, he said. Pugh wants good men
